title: Why was Panth not part of the juggernaut update?
body: He is an early game bully who is useless late game, just like darius. Why wasn't he updated? ( Assuming he is a juggernaut at all)

replies.body:
Juggies are champions lacking in dash/flash mobility.

Panth's shield bash leap precludes him from this category.
This is basically the answer. Fighters with dashes that allow them to reliably get to enemy squishies are not juggernauts. (Renekton, Irelia, Panth, Wukong etc)
